description: Short on time? This speedy dinner recipe is for you. These mexican-inspired wraps filled with haloumi, meatballs and corn, topped with creamy chipotle sauce are sure to satisfy.
keywords: Tortilla,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Spring,Low sugar,Nov 2020,Sesame free,Beef,High protein,High fibre,Pork,Quick & easy lunch,Dinner Made Easy,Peanut free
name: Speedy Haloumi, Meatball & Corn Salsa Wraps Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 480g BBQ haloumi kebabs with pork & beef meatballs
300g BBQ Mexican style street corn with chipotle & feta

recipeInstructions.text: Heat a greased barbecue grill or chargrill pan over high heat. Cook tortillas for 30 seconds on each side or until they start to char. Transfer to a plate. Cover to keep warm.
Cook kebabs on chargrill, turning, for 5 minutes or until cooked through.
Remove corn from packet, reserving feta and sauce. Cook corn on chargrill, turning, for 5 minutes or until charred. Cut kernels from cobs. Place in a bowl
Using a fork, remove meatballs and haloumi from skewers. Top tortillas with corn mixture, haloumi and meatballs. Drizzle with reserved sauce. Serve.
